languages.text: Астропатическая станция замерла перед флагманом. На вокс-частотах царит мертвенная тишина, огни погашены. Даже те, кто не чуток к варпу, ощущают, что смерть уже здесь, прячется в тенях. Тем страшнее читать доклады астропатов, ежесекундно слышащие призрачный вой, доносящийся со станции.

The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. Even those who have no warp sensitivity can feel the presence of death. It is here, lurking in the shadows. All of this makes reading the reports of the ship's Astropaths, who claim to be hearing an incessant ghostly howl emanating from the station, all the more disturbing.
languages.original_text: Астропатическая станция замерла перед флагманом. На вокс-частотах царит мертвенная тишина, огни погашены. Даже те, кто не чуток к варпу, ощущают, что смерть уже здесь, прячется в тенях. Тем страшнее читать доклады астропатов, ежесекундно слышащие призрачный вой, доносящийся со станции.

languages.text: La estación astropática está justo delante de la nave, inmóvil. Todas sus frecuencias de voco mantienen un silencio sepulcral. No hay luz. Incluso aquellos sin ningún tipo de sensibilidad hacia la disformidad pueden percibir la presencia de la muerte. Está ahí dentro, acechando en las sombras. Todo esto hace más inquietante aún el informe de los Astrópatas de la nave, que afirman oír un lamento incesante y fantasmagórico procedente de la estación.
languages.original_text: The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. Even those who have no warp sensitivity can feel the presence of death. It is here, lurking in the shadows. All of this makes reading the reports of the ship's Astropaths, who claim to be hearing an incessant ghostly howl emanating from the station, all the more disturbing.

languages.text: 感応通信官ステーションは、ヴォイドシップの前方にある。じっと動かない。ヴォクス周波数には生気のない沈黙が流れている。明かりも付いていない。<歪み>に敏感ではない者でも死の気配を感じられる。死はここにあって、影に潜んでいるのだ。これらすべてが、ステーションから絶え間なく発せられる悍ましいうめき声を聞いたという感応通信官の報告を、より一層不穏なものにしていた。
languages.original_text: The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. Even those who have no warp sensitivity can feel the presence of death. It is here, lurking in the shadows. All of this makes reading the reports of the ship's Astropaths, who claim to be hearing an incessant ghostly howl emanating from the station, all the more disturbing.

traits.locale_text: 感応通信官ステーションは、ヴォイドシップの前方にある。じっと動かない。ヴォクス周波数には生気のない沈黙が流れている。明かりも付いていない。<歪み>に敏感ではない者でも死の気配を感じられる。死はここにあって、影に潜んでいるのだ。これらすべてが、ステーションから絶え間なく発せられる悍ましいうめき声を聞いたという感応通信官の報告を、より一層不穏なものにしていた。

languages.text: 星语者星站就在旗舰正前方，没有一丝生气。星站上一片漆黑，音阵频道上传来的只有一片死寂。哪怕是对亚空间影响很迟钝的人，都能感觉到死亡的存在——它就在这里，潜伏在阴影之中。目睹了这样的景象之后，船上星语者发来的报告令人感到愈发不安。他们声称这座星站传来了哀嚎声，片刻不曾停歇。
languages.original_text: The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. Even those who have no warp sensitivity can feel the presence of death. It is here, lurking in the shadows. All of this makes reading the reports of the ship's Astropaths, who claim to be hearing an incessant ghostly howl emanating from the station, all the more disturbing.

languages.text: Die astropathische Station liegt direkt vor dem Raumschiff. Nichts regt sich. Auf ihren Vox-Frequenzen herrscht leblose Stille. Ihre Lichter sind erloschen. Selbst, wer keine Warp-Empfindsamkeit besitzt, kann die Anwesenheit des Todes spüren. Es ist hier, lauert in den Schatten. All das hier macht die Auswertung der Berichte der Astropathen des Schiffs, die behaupten, ein geisterhaftes Heulen in der Station zu hören, noch beunruhigender.
languages.original_text: The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. Even those who have no warp sensitivity can feel the presence of death. It is here, lurking in the shadows. All of this makes reading the reports of the ship's Astropaths, who claim to be hearing an incessant ghostly howl emanating from the station, all the more disturbing.

languages.text: La station astropathique se trouve devant le vaisseau spatial, mais elle est immobile. Ses fréquences vox ne diffusent rien d'autre qu'un silence funeste. Toutes ses lumières sont éteintes. Même ceux qui ne sont pas sensibles au Warp sentent la présence de la mort. Elle est là, tapie dans l'ombre. Autant de choses qui rendent plus troublante encore la lecture des rapports des astropathes, qui prétendent entendre un hurlement spectral incessant en provenance de la station.
languages.original_text: The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. languages.text: Astropatik istasyonu, uçsuz gemisinin tam önünde hareketsiz bir şekilde uzanıyor. Voks frekanslarının ötesinde ölüm sessizliği hâkim. Işıkları yanmıyor. Öteboyut hassasiyeti olmayanlar bile ölümün varlığını hissedebiliyor. Ölüm orada, karanlıkta sinsice geziyor. Tüm bunlar, istasyondan bitmek bilmeden yayılan hayaletvari ulumalar duyduklarını iddia eden gemideki Astropatların raporlarını okumayı daha da huzursuz kılıyor.
languages.original_text: The Astropathic station is dead ahead of the voidship. It is motionless. There is lifeless silence across its vox-frequencies. Its lights are out. Even those who have no warp sensitivity can feel the presence of death. It is here, lurking in the shadows. All of this makes reading the reports of the ship's Astropaths, who claim to be hearing an incessant ghostly howl emanating from the station, all the more disturbing.
